title: What does the Rorschach Test have to do with politics?
itunes:author: David B. Feldman - psychology | social science | politics | mental health
itunes:summary: Strangely enough, the Rorschach Inkblot Test may have something to teach us about how to have political conversations in the age of "alternative facts."
